build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --no-interaction --prefer-dist --optimize-autoloader && npm ci && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: php artisan migrate --force && php artisan db:seed --class=ProductionSeeder && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache && php artisan storage:link && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
